Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Very nice and cozy place. Ribs and pull pork are nice. Not so sure about chicken wings. Side dishes like beans and corn are great. The corn bread is awesome. If you group is big make sure to choose the family menu, basic is good enough

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: I'm quite surprised with all the rage about good ribs. I think they are arguably pretty bad, dry and with very little meat on them. Brisket was better, yet far from tender or juicy. Pulled pork was ok. Prices are too high for the quality you get. On the good side service was nice.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: I thought the food was fantastic! A lot of great southern dishes. Cornbread, coleslaw, baked beans, ribs, brisket...so good. Can't wait for the chicken and waffles! If you like southern American BBQ, you've found the closest thing to being …

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Good quality meat, vegetables and desserts but all a bit over priced. Therefore 3 stars instead of 4.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text:
Best Bbq joint in NL, very nice staff (best i've had in amsterdam) and owner even gave me a small tour in his kitchen.
Love the atmosphere and the food!!

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: I liked the interior somewhat; that's what attracted us to this place. After ordering we got food worth 80 euros for three people. It could probably feed 1,5. Besides that the meat was cold and drained in sauce there was no nice flavor what …

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text:
Great food, great atmosphere.
Positive
+ Live and radio music. …

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: You don't find barbeque this good often. Don't waste your time on Rib joints in the city. Go here - every piece of meat brings a different flavor. The sides are all delicious (baked beans especially) and the staff is friendly and attentive. Passion goes into making this food and it shows.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Pretty good ribs, from a real smoker. Not the greatest, but definitely some of the best I've had in Europe. Some good beers as well. Friendly service, good atmosphere. A good joint. I would come back.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Amazing atmosphere, appropriate music, genuine staff, good smokey ribs, nice side dishes and relatively cheap. I do however recommend ordering less food than you think youll eat, portions are large (doggybags are common).

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: I dont know why this place had only a 3.7 so went to check the reviews and have to say ive been many times and have never had those experiences at gracelands myself. The service is good, not super fast but not way to slow either. Perfect …

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Fab place to eat. Great place for cavemen and their cavewomen. Staff are really friendly.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Pretty crappy experience, its expensive for what you get. And what you get is just not what you want. The spareribs are raw(they smoked it for 8 hours is what they said), the chicken was tasteless, the pieces of meat were very dry and …

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Lekker eten. Nice 'American bitsro' style BBQ place.  Food is good & portions are good.  A little bit on the expensive side but not overpriced by Amsterdam standards. 3 course dinner was about €38

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: The atmosphere is great and the food is pretty good, but the service is terrible.  We didn't get half our order even after reminding them several times.  We finally asked them to forget it and just take it off the bill.  We also had to get our own plates and silverware and bus our own table.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Another winner in the Sin City of Europe, Amsterdam! Fancy yourself an ole red neck looking for a place to put your hoe down or just out on the town looking for a great place to eat something left of centre in Amsterdam? Then Graceland B-BQ …

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Very small portions, I had ribs but they were very dry and almost meatless. An overpriced restaurant for the quality and quantity you get. Staff is friendly.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Awesome, rough, macho roadhouse honky-tonk kind of a typical authentic American grill and smokehouse restaurant. Often they have great bands playing. Brisket, smokey ribs, smoked fish and pulled pork are amazing! Truly mouthwatering! Slow …

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: I go here sometimes with an American friend of mine - he was mesmerised the first time by how much the place could have been any place in the US and felt like home. …

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text:
Great bbq meals, nice beers and friendly staff.
The ambiance and looks of the place are great.
Kitchen can be extremely slow tho and the portions disappointingly​ small.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Really a great place to hangout and have some nice beer , good whiskey or food. The place is,so I have been told, just like in Texas. They also serve a great deal of vegetarian food.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Delicious! Authentic southern barbeque and a solid offering of traditional and creative side items. Moderately more expensive and smaller portions though compared to the U.S.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: One of the few places in Amsterdam where BBQ is done properly. Make sure to try the exotic desserts such as the Fat Elvis cake (Peanut butter, banana and bacon!)

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Great place with friendly stuff. They did everything thwy could so we had a great time. Thank you guys. We will come back, has an real  American BBQ style & taste.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: I enjoyed a lot the rockabilly atmosphere but unfortunately the food is not at the same level. It can reach 4 stars for drinking a couple of rounds with friends but I can't give more stars for having a dinner.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: How can i have overlooked this place for so long? Excellent food. Atmosphere is great (sunday night live music). Staff makes this place,  super service! Will be back soon.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Great bbq meats.  Unpretentious - Untainted. Just get the xxxl graceland bbq, take the fat-elvis pie, and ask for a pickleback shot as digestivo. Your belly will be happy.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Too good to be true: two veggies joined a carnivore pack and ended up eating their fantastic fill at a barbecue joint. Will be back w more veggie buddies!

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Good food, nice beer and friendly staff. One complaint: The live band was so loud it was unable to talk to the person sitting next to you.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Small portions for to much money. We ordered a meal for 2 persons. It was just enough for 1 person. …

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Great ribs, with lots of sauce. Sides can be a bit hit-n-miss, but let's face it, you're there for the meat.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Yummy Texan-styled BBQ dishes with generous amounts of meat, plenty of veggie sides and an authentic atmosphere.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: American style restaurant. Food is nice enough though the ribs are not barbecued which was a bit disappointing

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: This is a place where you feel that the people working here are doing so with love and passion for what they do. That makes this a great atmosphere to be in, filled with very nice staff and great food!

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Best American style bbq joint in town. Slow and smoked meat and good bears.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Good food... Great menu for sharing between larger groups ..meat was cooked great!

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Love the food and theme they've got going on here.  Never expected a place like this in the Netherlands.  Hushpuppies! :)

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Pretty disappointed with the place, very generic food full of sauces rather than a more raw eating experience.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: The Brisket and their BBQ sauce are delicious. Also try their lime pie.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Really good Yank food, excellent service and great all round atmosphere.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Fine restaurant. American style. Great impression. Try various beers.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: My favorite BBQ place in Amsterdam, the sides are fantastic.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text:
Not what I expected. I expected more meat with some dishes.

The place looks great though.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Better avoid this place. Really remote, the slowcooked ribs were not hot anymore.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Good food, took a while to get our orders though.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Pretty obscure location, but nothing wrong with the food. Friendly staff

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Unbalanced food, complete lack of service, pricey, great pie

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Great ribs, friendly staff, good vibes.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Original food from the USA. Realy nice ribs!

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Ok food and drinks, not bad not special!

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Authentic and laid back, good food, good drinks.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Good food, nice and relaxed atmosphere

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Good BBQ stuff in a "rustic" environment.

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Knock out food. Great music

Name: Graceland Bar-B-Q
Review Text: Great food and atmosphere.

(Translated by Google) Fantastic team, super enthusiastic, incredibly friendly, very involved and full of knowledge of their own products!

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Super nice American atmosphere! Very friendly staff & cook. We quickly received our food, which by the way was super tasty, and for a top price. The home made ice tea and home sauce are recommended !! …

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Amateur service, expensive side dishes (6eur for a small bowl of sweet potato fries), medium quality meat. …
